title: The Carp Song

tokens.lyric: Take my hand come with me we're building a new home

lines.raw: [G]Take my hand come with me we're building a new home

tokens.lyric: A place where we can live in peace and never feel alone

lines.raw: [C]A place where we can live in peace and never feel alone

tokens.lyric: Come see the world the way we do

lines.raw: [Em]Come see the world the way we do

tokens.lyric: Open your heart love will be yours, Forever

tokens.lyric: So come sing our song
Hey hey ooh ooh

tokens.lyric: We stand for peace, we march for love

tokens.lyric: We all are one under the sun, we all are one under the sun

lines.raw: [C]We all are one under the sun, we all are one under the sun

tokens.lyric: Brothers and sisters, we're dreaming of a better world

lines.raw: [Em]Brothers and sisters, we're dreaming of a better world

tokens.lyric: Look around, catch the truth and spread it out loud I say
